titleStmt.title: The dimension of the hollow tree of Hampsted.
titleStmt.author: Codrington, Robert, 1601-1665.

Lee, Johannes.
Browne, Moses.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Cotes for M.S. at the Blue Bible in Green Arbour, and are to be given or sold on the Hollow Tree at Hampsted,

notesStmt.note: Verse, by various hands - "Civill people, you welcome be,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
